summary: Product slider (Swiper.js) testing completed successfully. All slider features working: navigation arrows, autoplay (4s delay), pagination dots, responsive breakpoints, product badges, add to cart buttons, and product link navigation.
critical_code_review_comments: Swiper.js implementation is well-structured with proper modules (Navigation, Pagination, Autoplay)
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
Responsive breakpoints correctly configured: 1 item (mobile), 2 items (640px), 3 items (1024px), 4 items (1280px)
Product badges use gradient backgrounds with proper color coding per badge type
context_for_next_testing_agent: Product slider is fully functional with Swiper.js v12.0.3. All 10 products display correctly with badges (BESTSELLER, NIEUW, POPULAIR, VOORDEELSET). Navigation, autoplay, pagination, and add-to-cart all working. Product data comes from mockData.js (MOCKED - no backend API).

slider_navigation_arrows.details: Left/right navigation buttons work correctly, slider moves to next/previous slides

slider_autoplay.details: Autoplay works with 4 second delay, pauses on mouse hover

slider_pagination_dots.details: 10 pagination bullets visible, clickable, active bullet highlighted with purple color

slider_responsiveness.details: Desktop: 4 items, Tablet (768px): 2 items, Mobile (390px): 1 item

add_to_cart_buttons.details: All 10 products have 'In Winkelmandje' buttons that add products to cart and open cart sidebar

product_link_navigation.details: Clicking product title navigates to /product/{id} page with full product details

product_badges.details: All badge types displayed correctly: BESTSELLER (amber/orange), NIEUW (green), POPULAIR (blue), VOORDEELSET (purple/pink)

product_pricing.details: Regular prices and sale prices (with strikethrough original) display correctly
